parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To cut around, circumcise. From peri and the base of tomoteros; to cut around, i.e. to circumcise.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I call, summon, invite, (b) I call, name. Akin to the base of keleuo; to 'call'.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (lit: I draw over), mid: I become as uncircumcised. From epi and spao; to draw over, i.e. efface the mark of circumcision.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
From akron and probably a modified form of posthe; the prepuce; by implication, an uncircumcised state or person.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I call, summon, invite, (b) I call, name. Akin to the base of keleuo; to 'call'.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To cut around, circumcise. From peri and the base of tomoteros; to cut around, i.e. to circumcise.
